description: This file defines a React functional component 'AnteaterDashboard' used as a dashboard page for 'Giant Anteater' within a species-specific section. It includes UI elements such as filters, buttons, and placeholders for charts/stubs, with theme variables for styling. It also defines auxiliary components for the chart cards, legend, and chart stubs.

methods.name: ChartCard
methods.description: A reusable React component that displays a chart with a title and click handler.

methods.name: Legend
methods.description: Displays a legend for behavior color mappings.
